title: Jhin R Glitch

embed.description: Vidme is the simplest way to upload and share videos, no signup required.

body: As you can see, you can fire one ultimate shot out of range before you fire the rest. I think you can only fire once before the range appears. And this does take in one of 4 shots. I am not sure if this only affects Practice Mode because I can't repeat the glitch perfectly as you can see in the video.

replies.body: This a bug with practice tool messing up Jhin's R, Turn off repeat cooldown then it doesn't work. I spent too long with that.. T_T
